content: lion brand pattern # 60751a corrections applied nov 12 2008 skill level easy level 2 wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 7 balls *shown in lemongrass* crochet hook - size s-35 speed hook 19 mm gauge 5-double_crochet group and 1 single_crochet = 4 in 10 cm in shell pattern pattern 2-row repeat work in pattern until piece measures 52 in 132 cm from beginning do not fasten_off crochet edging to finish
